ComicInfo.Summary: NOW MONTHLY! After the status quo altering events of the last issue, Gary Hampton, The Astounding Wolf-Man sets out in search of the creature responsible for the wreck his life has become: The Elder. This issue marks the beginning of a new story arc, picking up right where THE ASTOUNDING WOLF-MAN, VOL. 1 left off - a perfect jumping on point for new readers!
ComicInfo.Tags: Westedge Outlet Center,Chloe Hampton,The Elder,Willow Greek Camping Ground,Wolf-Man,Dunford,Wolf-Man's Lair,Agent Hunter
